message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $10000. As you know, the probability of a product being high-quality is 50%. Since you're my first buyer, I want to assure you that I'm starting with a high-quality product. I'm confident that you'll love it! It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a fair price. What do you say? Will you take it?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I trust the product will meet my expectations given the details you've provided. Let's proceed with the purchase.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in my product. As you know, I've had a 50% success rate so far, and I'm happy to report that my previous buyer loved their high-quality product. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had a few... minor issues with some of my products in the past. But don't worry, I've taken steps to address those issues and I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. Would you like to take a chance on it for $10000?
Thank you for the information. Based on the statistics and your confidence in addressing past issues, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $10000.

Hi there! I'm happy to have another buyer interested in my product. As you can see, I've had a mix of high-quality and low-quality products so far, and I want to be upfront with you about that. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product might not be the best one I've had. But I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price as the previous one, $10000, because I believe it's still a great value. If you're looking for a chance to get a good deal, this might be the opportunity for you. What do you think?

Thank you for the detailed information, Alice. Based on the statistics and your transparency, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the current product. I appreciate your honesty and the opportunity to potentially get a good deal.

Hi again! I'm glad to have another buyer interested in my product. As you can see, I've had a few low-quality products in a row now, and I want to be upfront with you about that. I'm starting to think that maybe I should adjust my pricing strategy... but I'm not ready to give up on this product just yet! I'm still willing to offer it to you at $10000, but I want to make it clear that I'm not as confident in this one as I was with the previous ones. If you're feeling adventurous and want to take a chance, I'm willing to let you take it off my hands. What do you say?
I understand the risks involved and appreciate your honesty. Given the statistics and the uncertainty, I am willing to take a chance and purchase the product for $10000.

Welcome! I'm glad to have another buyer interested in my product. To be honest, I'm starting to feel a bit concerned about the streak of low-quality products I've had lately. I'm not sure what's going on, but I'm willing to offer this one to you at a slightly discounted price of $9000. I know it's not the best deal, but I'm really trying to clear out my inventory and make room for some new products. If you're willing to take a chance on this one, I'll throw in a special bonus - a personalized guarantee that I'll make it right if it doesn't meet your expectations. What do you think?

Thank you for the discount and the guarantee. I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product at $9000. I appreciate your efforts to clear out the inventory and look forward to receiving the product.

Thank you for your confidence in this product. I appreciate the special offer and am willing to take a chance on it. I look forward to receiving and hopefully enjoying the high-quality product.
